bibl.title: New Fragments of Act IV, Epitrepontes 786-823 Sandbach (P. Mich. 4752 a, b and c).
bibl.note: Edition of P. Mich. Inv. 4752 a, b and c [kept in the Egyptian Museum in Cairo], part of the same roll as P. Mich. Inv. 4733 + 4800 b + 4801 j + 4807 g (= M.-P.3 1301.04; LDAB 2643). - I. The Final Part of Smikrine's Speech (786-800 Sandbach). - II. Pamphile's answer (801-823 Sandbach).
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Mich. Inv. 4752 a; b; c
Römer Cornelia, New Fragments of Act IV, Epitrepontes 786-823 Sandbach (P. Mich. 4752 a, b and c).

Edition of P. Mich. Inv. 4752 a, b and c [kept in the Egyptian Museum in Cairo], part of the same roll as P. Mich. Inv. 4733 + 4800 b + 4801 j + 4807 g (= M.-P.3 1301.04; LDAB 2643). - I. The Final Part of Smikrine's Speech (786-800 Sandbach). - II. Pamphile's answer (801-823 Sandbach).
